body.name: SAIWAN 3GM7 Tablet 7 inch Android 11，3G LTE,WiFi 6,1GB RAM 16GB ROM, 1024x600 HD IPS Display, Quad Core Processor, Dual Camera, Bluetooth 4.2, Portable Tablet PC(Gray)
body.stockDetail: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 6 hrs 48 mins
features: Memory and Processor:3GM7 tablet has a quad-core 1.3GHZ processor with lower power consumption,which is able to run multiple programs with high efficiency,more stable performance and better gaming performance.When playing games,you can experience smoother animation effects.

Android 11 Tablet: Tablet has Android 11 and has outstanding features that make it smooth and fast to use.7 inch tablet is certified by Google and you can download many free apps from the app shop such as YouTube/Facebook/Twitter. etc.

1024x600 HD IPS Screen:3GM7 7-inch tablet has a bright 1024x600 resolution IPS screen,allowing you to intuitively experience the unexpected benefits of smooth HD picture quality when watching videos.The tablet has 1GB of RAM and 16GB of ROM for super fast storage.

Lasting entertainment:The 3GM7 tablet is equipped with a 2500 mAh rechargeable battery so you can watch videos, read eBooks,listen to songs and more all day long with up to 6 hours of battery life and a lightweight,slim profile so you can take it with you.

Support 3G LTE:3GM7 tablet with 3G LTE and 802.11 b/g/n WIFI and Bluetooth 4.2 support, it delivers automatic network switching and smooth connections wherever you go, you never have to worry about getting lost.
body.description: The 3GM7 Android 11 tablet has a gorgeous 7 inch 1024x600 IPS screen, a high performance quad-core 1.3GHZ processor for high speed operation, smooth graphics and a great experience and is certified by Google to download a large number of free apps. Specifications: Battery: 2500mAh/Lithium-ion Screen: 10" IPS 1024*600 HD RAM: 1GB ROM: 16GB Maximum expansion: 512GB OS: Android 11 WI-FI & BT: WIFI + Bluetooth 4.2 Dual camera: 0.3MP front + 2MP rear G-Sensor: Support GPS: Support GLONASS: Support Speakers: Built-in stereo speakers Input/output ports: 1 Type-C USB, 1 headphone jack, 1 micro SD card slot What's in the box? 1 x 3GM7 Tablet1 x User guidance 1 x USB data cable 1 x Screen film (laminated)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars the specs & price should tell you
reviews.reviewText: Slow, crashes constantly, lags. The specs are an indicator you can't do anything productive on this. Purchased it to use in the kitchen to watch/listen to my shows while cooking. but did not expect it to crash so much. only keeping it because I have already downloaded my app. Basically best use is just for emailif you were thinking of getting cheap tablet for a child this one is NOT recommended. It would be difficult to play any game & even watch videos uninterrupted - child would probably toss it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Will not connect to wifi
reviews.reviewText: I bought 6 of these SIX!! So I could have them for our Christmas party… they arrived the day before- I charged them up- and not even 1 of them would connect to the WiFi so I could let the grandkids use them! So disappointed… I guess you get what you pay for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money
reviews.reviewText: My son still wants on my phone because it doesn't work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No English Instructions
reviews.reviewText: No English Manual for US residents.
